Battle.AutoStop: Press anything to stop Auto Battle.
Battle.AutoHelp: Sets party to Auto Battle mode.
Battle.SkillHelp: Opens a list of skills under the \C[16]%1\C[0] category.
Battle.ItemHelp: Opens a list of items that you can use.
Battle.AutoHelp2: Automatically choose an action suitable for combat.
State.Death.Desc: Prevents from doing anything until revived.
State.Debuff.Physical.Desc: Reduces Defence and Magical Defence by 5%.
State.Debuff.Earth.Desc: Reduces Evasion and Magical Evasion by 15%.
State.Debuff.Wind.Desc: Reduces Accuracy and Crit Chance by 15%.
State.Debuff.Star.Desc: Increases all non-DoT damage taken by 10%.
State.Debuff.Void.Desc: Reduces Attack and Magical Attack by 5%.
State.DoT.Physical.Desc: Deals Physical damage every turn, reduces Defence and Magical Defence by 7.5%.
State.DoT.Fire.Desc: Deals Fire damage every turn, reduces maximum HP by 10%.
State.DoT.Ice.Desc: Deals Ice damage every turn, and reduces Agility by 10%.
State.DoT.Electricity.Desc: Deals Electrical damage every turn, and increases DoT taken by 5%.
State.DoT.Water.Desc: Deals Water damage every turn, and reduces Luck by 15%.
State.DoT.Earth.Desc: Deals Earth damage every turn (ignoring 20% of DEM/MDF), and reduces Evasion and Magical Evasion by 5%.
State.DoT.Wind.Desc: Deals Wind damage every turn (having 25% higher ATK/DEF scaling), and reduces Accuracy and Crit Rate by 5%.
State.DoT.Star.Desc: Deals Star damage every turn, and increases non-DoT damage taken by 15%.
State.DoT.Void.Desc: Deals Void damage every turn, alongside reducing Attack and Magical Attack by 7.5%.
State.DoT.Nature.Desc: Deals Natural damage every turn, an decreases damage dealt by 15%.
State.CC.Physical.Desc: Reduces Defence and Magical Defence by 10% and prevents from taking action. Strongly Delays upon being applied.
State.CC.Fire.Desc: Deals Fire damage every turn, reduces Max HP by 20%, and prevents from taking action. Turns into Singed upon expire.
State.CC.Ice.Desc: Increases damage taken by 50%, reduces Agility by 20%, and prevents from taking action. Breaks upon being attacked, and turns into Frost upon expire.
State.CC.Electricity.Desc: Increases DoT damage taken by 25% and prevents from taking action.
State.CC.Water.Desc: Reduces Luck by 25% and prevents from taking action.
State.CC.Earth.Desc: Prevents from taking action. Has a chance of being prolonged every turn.
State.CC.Wind.Desc: Prevents from taking action and has a chance of Insta-Killing every turn.
State.CC.Star.Desc: Deals 110% Star DoT and prevents from taking action. Turns into Weakness upon expire.
State.CC.Void.Desc: Reduces Agility by 90%, increases all damage taken by 10%, and prevents from taking action.
State.CC.Nature.Desc: Deals Natural damage every turn and prevents from taking action. Turns into Poison upon expire.
State.CC.Elementless.Desc: Increases HP and MP Regen by 2.5%, but prevents from taking action.
State.PCC.Berserk.Desc: Forces to attack enemies with Basic Attack. Increases ATK, MAT, AGI, and LUK by 20%.
State.PCC.Violent.Desc: Forces to attack enemies with Basic Attack.
State.PCC.Confused.Desc: Forces to attack random units with Basic Attack.
State.PCC.Corruption.Desc: Forces to attack random units with Basic Attack. Very hard to dispel.
State.PCC.Dominated.Desc: Forces to attack allies with Basic Attack. Increases DoT damage taken by 10%.
State.PCC.Anomalous.Desc: Forces to attack allies with Basic Attack. Can spread Melting Blessing. Turns into Melting Blessing upon dispelling. Is a lose condition.
State.Mesmerized.Desc: Increases AGI by 50.5. Turns into a random debuff upon expire.
State.Focus.Desc1: Increases Crit Rate and Luck by 5%, and Evasion by 3%, and increases resistance to CCs and pseudo-CCs by 10%
State.Focus.Desc2: Increases Crit Rate and Luck by 7.5%, and Evasion by 6%, and increases resistance to CCs and pseudo-CCs by 20%
State.Focus.Desc3: Increases Crit Rate and Luck by 10%, and Evasion by 9%, and increases resistance to CCs and pseudo-CCs by 30%
State.Focus.Desc4: Increases Crit Rate and Luck by 12.5%, and Evasion by 12%, and increases resistance to CCs and pseudo-CCs by 40%
State.ChakraStrengthen.Desc1: Increases Crit Rate and Luck by 15%, and Evasion by 15%, and increases resistance to CCs and pseudo-CCs by 50%
State.ChakraStrengthen.Desc2: Increases Crit Rate and Luck by 17.5%, and Evasion by 18%, and increases resistance to CCs and pseudo-CCs by 60%
State.ChakraOverload.Desc: Increases Crit Rate and Luck by 20%, and Evasion by 21%, and increases resistance to CCs and pseudo-CCs by 70%
State.NurikabeWall.Desc1: Absorbs damage based on remaining shield. Reduces damage taken by 5%.
State.NurikabeWall.Desc2: Absorbs damage based on remaining shield. Reduces damage taken by 10%.
State.NurikabeWall.Desc3: Absorbs damage based on remaining shield. Reduces damage taken by 15%.
State.NurikabeBarrier.Desc: Absorbs damage based on remaining shield. Reduces damage taken by 20%.
State.NurikabeFortress.Desc: Absorbs damage based on remaining shield. Reduces damage taken by 25% and increases damage dealt by 10%.
State.Tag.Desc: Deals self-damage equal to 125% of ATK after expiration.
State.ExplosiveTag.Desc: Absorbs damage based on remaining shield. Reduces damage taken by 25% and increases damage dealt by 10%.
State.Tag.Desc1: Deals self-damage equal to 150% of ATK after expiration.
State.Tag.Desc2: Deals self-damage equal to 175% of ATK after expiration.
State.Tag.Desc3: Deals self-damage equal to 200% of ATK after expiration.
State.Tag.Desc4: Deals self-damage equal to 225% of ATK after expiration.
Skill.Hana.ShurikenThrow.1.Desc: Throws a shuriken at the enemies, dealing 150% Material Weapon-elemental damage to a random enemy.
Skill.Hana.ShurikenThrow.2.Desc: Throws a shuriken at the enemies, dealing 175% Material Weapon-elemental damage to a random enemy.
Skill.Hana.ShurikenThrow.3.Desc: Throws two shurikens at the enemies, dealing 100% Material Weapon-elemental damage to 2 random enemies.
Skill.Hana.ShurikenThrow.4.Desc: Throws two shurikens at the enemies, dealing 125% Material Weapon-elemental damage to 2 random enemies.
Skill.Hana.ShurikenThrow.5.Desc: Throws two shurikens at the enemies, dealing 150% Material Weapon-elemental damage to 2 random enemies. Ignores 10% of enemy DEF.
Skill.Hana.ShurikenThrow.6.Desc: Throws two shurikens at the enemies, dealing 175% Material Weapon-elemental damage to 2 random enemies. Ignores 20% of enemy DEF.
Skill.Hana.ShurikenThrow.7.Desc: Throws five shurikens at the enemies, dealing 80% Material Weapon-elemental damage to 5 random enemies. Ignores 25% of enemy DEF.
Skill.Hana.WindThrow.1.Desc: Throws a wind orb, dealing 200% Material Wind damage to a single enemy.
Skill.Hana.WindThrow.2.Desc: Throws a wind orb, dealing 250% Material Wind damage to a single enemy.
Skill.Hana.WindThrow.3.Desc: Throws a wind orb, dealing 300% Material Wind damage to a single enemy.
Skill.Hana.WindThrow.4.Desc: Throws a wind orb, dealing 350% Material Wind damage to a single enemy, and has a 25% chance to reduce their DEF by 1 stage.
Skill.Hana.WindThrow.5.Desc: Throws a wind orb, dealing 400% Material Wind damage to a single enemy, and has a 50% chance to reduce their DEF by 1 stage.
Skill.Hana.WindThrow.6.Desc: Throws a wind orb, dealing 450% Material Wind damage to a single enemy, and has a 75% chance to reduce their DEF by 1 stage.
Skill.Hana.WindThrow.7.Desc: Throws a wind orb, dealing 500% Material Wind damage to a single enemy, reducing their DEF by 1 stage, and having a 20% chance to Stun them for 1 turn.
Skill.Hana.KunaiSlash.1.Desc: Deals 140% Material Physical damage to a single enemy. Has a 5% higher Crit Rate.
Skill.Hana.KunaiSlash.2.Desc: Deals 85% Material Physical damage to a single enemy, twice. Has a 10% higher Crit Rate.
Skill.Hana.KunaiSlash.3.Desc: Deals 100% Material Physical damage to a single enemy, twice. Has a 15% higher Crit Rate.
Skill.Hana.KunaiSlash.4.Desc: Deals 57.5% Material Physical damage to a single enemy, 4 times. Has a 20% higher Crit Rate.
Skill.Hana.KunaiSlash.5.Desc: Deals 65% Material Physical damage to a single enemy, 4 times. Has a 25% higher Crit Rate.
Skill.Hana.KunaiSlash.6.Desc: Deals 72.5% Material Physical damage to a single enemy, 4 times. Has a 30% higher Crit Rate.
Skill.Hana.KunaiSlash.7.Desc: Deals 65% Material Physical damage to a single enemy, 5 times. Has a 40% higher Crit Rate and 10% higher Crit Damage.
Skill.Hana.Focus.1.Desc: Increases Crit Rate and Luck of a single ally by 5%, and Evasion by 3%, and increases their resistance to CCs and pseudo-CCs by 10%, for 3 turns.
Skill.Hana.Focus.2.Desc: Increases Crit Rate and Luck of a single ally by 7.5%, and Evasion by 6%, and increases their resistance to CCs and pseudo-CCs by 20%, for 3 turns.
Skill.Hana.Focus.3.Desc: Increases Crit Rate and Luck of a single ally by 10%, and Evasion by 9%, and increases their resistance to CCs and pseudo-CCs by 30%, for 3 turns.
Skill.Hana.Focus.4.Desc: Increases Crit Rate and Luck of a single ally by 12.5%, and Evasion by 12%, and increases their resistance to CCs and pseudo-CCs by 40%, for 3 turns.
Skill.Hana.Focus.5.Desc: Increases Crit Rate and Luck of a single ally by 15%, and Evasion by 15%, and increases their resistance to CCs and pseudo-CCs by 50%, for 4 turns. Additionally increases ATK and MAT by 1 stage.
Skill.Hana.Focus.6.Desc: Increases Crit Rate and Luck of a single ally by 17.5%, and Evasion by 18%, and increases their resistance to CCs and pseudo-CCs by 60%, for 4 turns. Additionally increases ATK and MAT by 1 stage.
Skill.Hana.Focus.7.Desc: Increases Crit Rate and Luck of a single ally by 20%, and Evasion by 21%, and increases their resistance to CCs and pseudo-CCs by 70%, for 5 turns. Additionally increases ATK, MAT, and LUK by 1 stage.
Skill.Hana.NurikabeWall.1.Desc: Grants a single ally a shield worth 200% of Hana's DEF, and makes them take 5% less damage for as long as the shield is up.
Skill.Hana.NurikabeWall.2.Desc: Grants a single ally a shield worth 225% of Hana's DEF, and makes them take 10% less damage for as long as the shield is up.
Skill.Hana.NurikabeWall.3.Desc: Grants a single ally a shield worth 250% of Hana's DEF, and makes them take 15% less damage for as long as the shield is up.
Skill.Hana.NurikabeWall.4.Desc: Grants a single ally a shield worth 275% of Hana's DEF and 50% of Hana's MDF, and makes them take 20% less damage for as long as the shield is up.
Skill.Hana.NurikabeWall.5.Desc: Grants a single ally a shield worth 300% of Hana's DEF and 100% of Hana's MDF, and makes them take 25% less damage and deal 10% more damage for as long as the shield is up.
Skill.Hana.BambooGrow.1.Desc: Deals 100% Material Natural damage 2 times to a single enemy, with 2 additional 20% chances for additional hits.
Skill.Hana.BambooGrow.2.Desc: Deals 125% Material Natural damage 2 times to a single enemy, with 2 additional 25% chances for additional hits.
Skill.Hana.BambooGrow.3.Desc: Deals 100% Material Natural damage 3 times to a single enemy, with 3 additional 30% chances for additional hits. Each hit has a 10% chance of applying Poison.
Skill.Hana.BambooGrow.4.Desc: Deals 125% Material Natural damage 3 times to a single enemy, with 3 additional 35% chances for additional hits. Each hit has a 20% chance of applying Poison.
Skill.Hana.BambooGrow.5.Desc: Deals 100% Material Natural damage 4 times to a single enemy, with 4 additional 40% chances for additional hits. Each hit has a 30% chance of applying Poison, and a 10% chance of Delaying the enemy for 1 Action.
Skill.Hana.Tag.1.Desc: Applies a paper bomb to enemy, which will explode after 3 turns, dealing 125% Physical damage to them, scaled off their own ATK.
Skill.Hana.Tag.2.Desc: Applies a paper bomb to enemy, which will explode after 3 turns, dealing 150% Fire damage to them, scaled off their own ATK.
Skill.Hana.Tag.3.Desc: Deals 100% Fire damage and applies a paper bomb to enemy, which will explode after 3 turns, dealing 175% Fire damage to them, scaled off their own ATK.
Skill.Hana.Tag.4.Desc: Deals 150% Fire damage and applies a paper bomb to enemy, which will explode after 2 turns, dealing 200% Fire damage to them, scaled off their own ATK.
Skill.Hana.Tag.5.Desc: Deals 200% Fire damage to one enemy and applies a paper bomb to all enemies, which will explode after 2 turns, dealing 225% Fire damage to them, scaled off their own ATK.
Ult.Ember.Desc:
Increases Body temperature by 10°, dealing high Fire damage to all enemies, while also applying Burn, Inferno, and a delay on them.
"Now it's time for you to try how pure inferno feels like!"
Enemy.KillerBot.Knight.Desc: An ordinary KillerBot that uses a blade. They're great at single-target attacks, and solely uses Material damage.
Enemy.KillerBot.Mage.Desc: An ordinary KillerBot that uses a wand. They have a lot of AoE Magical attacks and can buff other KillerBots as well.
Enemy.KillerBot.Gunner.Desc: An ordinary KillerBot that uses a gun. They're slow, but can deal a lot of Magical damage - especially if they Charge their Hyper Beam.
Enemy.KillerBot.Archer.Desc: An ordinary KillerBot that uses a bow. They can apply a lot of elemental debuffs, and are good at Material attacks.
Enemy.KillerBot.Feline.Desc: An ordinary KillerBot that uses a small blade and shield. They're clearly based on a catfolk, and they are fast and a total wildcard.
Enemy.KillerBot.Psychic.Desc: One of the most deadly KillerBots. It can utilise True Physical damage, and has even a chance to insta-kill you. Kill it without mercy.
Enemy.KillerBot.Princess.Desc: A corrupted rendition of an infamous mascot. It is normally passive, but can crash out when damaged and go into a frenzy. Also applies a weak Star-elemental DoT, even when passive.
Enemy.KillerBot.Psycho.Desc: These KillerBots are infamous even among KillerBots. They'll flood you with DoTs, and when they get bored they'll just kill you.
Enemy.KillerBot.Stargazer.Desc: A KillerBot design inspired by classic alien media. Largely uses Star-elemental attacks, though can handle Fire, Ice, and Electricity as well.
Enemy.Core.Thunder.Desc: The manifestation of Kastellia Temple's worship of the God of Rhythm. Try to get into its groove and learn its pattern, while avoiding its Electrical attacks.
Enemy.Core.Miracle.Desc: The rogue elemental energies manifested into this thing. It can change the element on a whim, and additionally is extremely resistant to anything but the element it is currently using and its opposite!
Enemy.Chimera.DrRoboNuts.Desc: This is the madman behind the Chimeras. Even in his attacks, he comes off as completely off the rails. Especially his SUPER LASER NUKE. Be careful.
Enemy.Office.Copyright.Desc: This office worker handles the copyrights. He can use this to copyright one of your elements, and if you use the copyrighted element, you should prepare for the consequences.
Enemy.Office.Patent.Desc: This office worker handles the patents. He can use this to patent one of your attack types, and if you use the patented type, you should prepare for the consequences.
Enemy.Office.TheCEO.Desc: The "brains" of Spleefium inc., but many think that CEOs are complete morons. Well, he is smart, just not in what he should. He can abuse Copyright and Patents to make some of your skills very dangerous to use.
